title: Director of Town Planning, M
clause_text: Director of Town Planning, M.S., Pune is authorised on behalf of Government to monitor the Township Project and submit his report once in six months to Government.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Director of Town Planning, M.S., Pune is authorised on behalf of Government to monitor the Township Project and submit his report once in six months to Government.
